com.jayway.restassured.response

Interface ValidatableResponse

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ValidatableResponseOptions<ValidatableResponse,Response>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ValidatableResponseImpl

    public interface ValidatableResponse
extends ValidatableResponseOptions<ValidatableResponse,Response>
    A validatable response of a request made by REST Assured.

    Usage example: 

     get("/lotto").then().body("lotto.lottoId", is(5));
